item.irons_spellbooks.arcane_salvage_des: 这种被遗忘的金属仍旧散发着微弱的魔法能量
item.irons_spellbooks.wayward_compass_de: 被囚禁的灵魂无时不想返回自己的家
item.irons_spellbooks.antiquated_compass: 一种远古的魔力牵引着指针一直指向...某种东西
item.irons_spellbooks.enchanted_ward_amu: The instilled ancient magic can protect against the Lost Citadel's magical ward
item.irons_spellbooks.emerald_stoneplate: 击杀生物掉落额外25%的经验。
ui.irons_spellbooks.inscription_table_ra: 这个卷轴的等级太高了，不适用于该法术书
key.irons_spellbooks.group_2: Iron's Spells 'n Spellbooks - 快捷施法
spell.irons_spellbooks.fireball.guide: Manifest and throw a ball of fire, exploding and dealing massive damage on impact.
spell.irons_spellbooks.burning_dash.guid: Quickly launch yourself forward in a haze of fire, and leave a small shockwave behind that damages and ignites nearby creatures.
spell.irons_spellbooks.teleport.guide: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, leaving nothing but a cloud of ender energy behind.
spell.irons_spellbooks.magic_missile.gui: Shoot a bolt of concentrated arcane magic. Also a trademark of every wizard.
spell.irons_spellbooks.cone_of_cold.guid: Hold to cast out a cone of cold energy, freezing creatures in its path.
spell.irons_spellbooks.electrocute.guide: Hold to manifest a cone of electrical energy, damaging creatures in its path.
spell.irons_spellbooks.heal.guide: Cast to infuse yourself with holy energy and immediately regain health.
spell.irons_spellbooks.blood_slash.guide: Slash forward to send out a concentrated blade of blood, growing in size as it travels.
spell.irons_spellbooks.summon_vex.guide: Cast to conjure vexes that will follow, protect, and fight for you.
spell.irons_spellbooks.firebolt.guide: Shoot a small projectile of fire, igniting whatever it hits.
spell.irons_spellbooks.fire_breath.guide: Hold to spew a cone of fire outwards, igniting creatures and blocks in its path.
spell.irons_spellbooks.icicle.guide: Fire a piercing bolt of cold energy in the form of an icicle, freezing those it touches.
spell.irons_spellbooks.firecracker.guide: Instantaneously conjure a firework where you look that explodes in a small radius around it.
spell.irons_spellbooks.angel_wing.guide: Cast to gain wings made of holy energy, acting as an elytra, for a brief period of time.
spell.irons_spellbooks.summon_horse.guid: Conjure a spectral steed that will follow you around and only let you ride. The horse's speed, health, and jump height scales with spell power.
spell.irons_spellbooks.spectral_hammer.g: Conjure a spectral hammer out from where you look that will mine all connected stone-type blocks in a cube where it hits, leaving only ores and rubble behind.
spell.irons_spellbooks.shield.guide: Conjure a stationary shield of arcane energy where you look that will block projectiles, but allow creatures to pass through.
spell.irons_spellbooks.wall_of_fire.guid: Hold to draw out a wall of fire that erupts when the cast finishes. It can be canceled early to immediately trigger, or will automatically cancel if you run out of length. This wall blocks projectiles and ignites creatures that pass through it.
spell.irons_spellbooks.wisp.guide: Conjure a projectile of holy energy that will float towards nearby targets and deal damage upon impact.
spell.irons_spellbooks.fang_strike.guide: Conjure a line of evoker fangs in front of you, in classic illager fashion.
spell.irons_spellbooks.fang_ward.guide: Conjure protective rings of evoker fangs around you, in classic illager fashion.
spell.irons_spellbooks.evasion.guide: Cast to imbue yourself with ender energy. Upon being attacked while under its effects, you will immediately teleport within a short radius and avoid taking any damage. Only a finite amount of hits can be dodged before the effect immediately wears off.
spell.irons_spellbooks.heartstop.guide: Cast to inflict yourself with Heartstop, an effect that makes you temporarily invulnerable. However, once it wears off, you take 50% of all damage accumulated while under its effects.
spell.irons_spellbooks.lightning_lance.g: Hold to charge a spear made of lightning. Release to throw it like a javelin, dealing high damage to the creature it hits.
spell.irons_spellbooks.lightning_bolt.gu: Down from the heavens, summon a bolt of lightning.
spell.irons_spellbooks.raise_dead.guide: Cast to summon undead minions from the earth beneath you. The higher the power, the better equipment they will have.
spell.irons_spellbooks.wither_skull.guid: Launch a wither skull forward that explodes in a small radius around the impact. The higher the level, the faster the projectile.
spell.irons_spellbooks.greater_heal.guid: A more powerful but much slower version of heal, this spell will completely heal yourself upon being casted.
spell.irons_spellbooks.cloud_of_regenera: Hold to slowly heal friendly creatures within a radius around you.
Hold to cast a ray of necrotic energy that siphons health from creatures it hits, damaging them and healing you.
spell.irons_spellbooks.magic_arrow.guide: Hold to charge a piercing arrow made of arcane energy. This arrow has no gravity and can travel through blocks.
spell.irons_spellbooks.lob_creeper.guide: Lob the head of a creeper forward that explodes in a medium radius around the impact. The higher the level, the faster the projectile.
spell.irons_spellbooks.creeper_revenge.g: The creeper tryna steal my stuff again
spell.irons_spellbooks.chain_creeper.gui: Around a targeted creature or block, conjure a ring of creeper heads that falls to the ground and explodes. Any creature killed by this blast will conjure another, smaller, ring of creeper heads. This can chain multiple times.
spell.irons_spellbooks.frost_step.guide: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, leaving behind a shadow of ice. This shadow will shatter after 3 seconds or upon taking any damage, shooting out icicles in every direction.
spell.irons_spellbooks.abyssal_shroud.gu: Cloak yourself with the shadows of the abyss, granting the ability to evade any attack for a short duration of time.
spell.irons_spellbooks.blaze_storm.guide: Hold to unleash a barrage of blaze fireballs, shooting rapidly but wildly in front of you and igniting any creatures or blocks hit.
spell.irons_spellbooks.ascension.guide: Cast to strike lightning at your feet and ascend quickly into the air, and gain reduced gravity for the next few seconds.
spell.irons_spellbooks.invisibility.guid: Cast to briefly grant yourself true invisibility, which hides armor and held items, but immediately wears off upon dealing damage.
spell.irons_spellbooks.blood_step.guide: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, or directly behind any targeted creature. Gain a short duration of true invisibility upon reaching your destination.
spell.irons_spellbooks.summon_polar_bear: Cast to summon a polar bear who will follow, protect, and fight for you, as well as providing a mount.
Cast to target any creature, showing a glowing outline. Completing the cast will heal this creature.
spell.irons_spellbooks.dragon_breath.gui: Hold to spew a cone of dragon breath forwards. Each time a creature is hit, there is a chance to create a pool of dragon breath at their feet.
spell.irons_spellbooks.fortify.guide: Upon casting, fortify every friendly creature within a radius around you, giving them temporary HP.
spell.irons_spellbooks.counterspell.guid: Cast to interrupt any targeted magical process, such as a casting creature or a magical projectile.
spell.irons_spellbooks.charge.guide: Imbue yourself with the power of lightning, increasing your speed and combat abilities.
spell.irons_spellbooks.void_tentacles.gu: From where you look, erupt a mass of void energy in the form of wailing tentacles, damaging and blinding creatures caught in the chaos.
spell.irons_spellbooks.ice_block.guide: Conjure a giant chunk of ice above a targeted creature or block. After a short delay, it will fall down and explode for area frost damage, doing additional damage to any creatures hit on the way down.
death.attack.ice_block_spell: %1$s was crushed by %2$s's giant block of ice
death.attack.firecracker_spell: %1$s went off with a bang thanks to %2$s
death.attack.lightning_lance_spell: %1$s was struck down by %2$s's lance of lightning
death.attack.lightning_bolt_spell: %2$s discovered that %1$s was not a lightning rod
death.attack.ascension_spell: %1$s was ascended to the afterlife with %2$s's help
death.attack.summon_polar_bear_spell.ite: %1$s was mauled by %2$s's polar bear using %3$s
death.attack.fire_breath_spell.item: %1$s was toasted by %2$s's flaming breath using %3$s
death.attack.dragon_breath_spell.item: %1$s was roasted by %2$s's dragon breath using %3$s
death.attack.ice_block_spell.item: %1$s was crushed by %2$s's giant block of ice using %3$s
death.attack.magic_arrow_spell.item: %1$s was punctured by %2$s's magic arrow using %3$s
death.attack.magic_missile_spell.item: %1$s was killed by %2$s's superior magic using %3$s
death.attack.firecracker_spell.item: %1$s went off with a bang thanks to %2$s's %3$s
death.attack.wisp_spell.item: %1$s was laid to rest by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.lightning_bolt_spell.item: %2$s discovered that %1$s was not a lightning rod while using %3$s
death.attack.lob_creeper_spell.item: %1$s was blown to smithereens by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.chain_creeper_spell.item: %1$s was blown to smithereens by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.blaze_storm_spell.item: %1$s was engulfed by %2$s's blazing fires using %3$s
death.attack.ascension_spell.item: %1$s was ascended to the afterlife with help from %2$s's %3$s
commands.irons_spellbooks.create_spell.f: Create failed. Max level of %s is %d
advancements.irons_spellbooks.root.title: Iron's Spells 'n  Spellbooks
advancements.irons_spellbooks.root.descr: There's more than meets the eye to this world...

advancements.irons_spellbooks.spell_book: Begin your journey with a spell book.
Obtain the unique spell book from the illagers.
advancements.irons_spellbooks.make_waywa: Craft a wayward compass, and find out where it leads...
advancements.irons_spellbooks.make_antiq: Craft an antiquated compass. Maybe don't find out where it leads...
advancements.irons_spellbooks.magic_aura: Encounter the magic aura blockading the Lost Citadel
